Package domain

Class CtrlKakuro

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.CtrlKakuro
  • public class CtrlKakuro
extends java.lang.Object
    Kakuro controller class. Used to collect and manage the use cases of a Kakuro.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CtrlKakuro​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[][]> kakuros)
      Default Kakuro Controller constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • listIdKakuro

        public int listIdKakuro()
        This method returns the number of Kakuros created in the system.
        Returns:
        Number of kakuros created.

      • generateKakuro

        public java.lang.String[][] generateKakuro​(int numRows,
                                           int numColumns,
                                           java.lang.String diff,
                                           int fc)
        This method uses a generation algorithm of a Kakuro, according to the following parameters.
        Parameters:
        numRows - It indicates the number of rows that the Kakuro will have.
        numColumns - It indicates the number of columns that the Kakuro will have.
        diff - It indicates the difficulty that the Kakuro will have
        fc - It indicates the number of white cells filled that the Kakuro will have.
        Returns:
        It returns the kakuro representated in String [][] with some white cells filled indicated by fc.

      • proposeKakuro

        public int proposeKakuro​(int numRows,
                         int numColumns,
                         java.lang.String[][] field)
        This method checks if the Kakuro proposed by the user is valid and it is created.
        Parameters:
        numRows - It indicates the number of rows that the Kakuro will have.
        numColumns - It indicates the number of columns that the Kakuro will have.
        field - It has the information of every individual Cell in the Kakuro.
        Returns:
        It will return true if the kakuro to be proposed has solution and otherwise false.

      • listKakuro

        public Kakuro listKakuro​(int id)
        Consultant function
        Returns:
        It returns a matrix of the information of all the cells of the kakuro

      • listIdKakuros

        public int[] listIdKakuros()
        This method returns a list of all the existing kakuro identifiers in the system.
        Returns:
        A list with all the identifiers.
